hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Let's work together? Connect with me on LinkedIn!
hero.bulletOneContent: Hands-on experience building and maintaining backend systems, from legacy applications to modern cloud-native solutions. Proficient in Java, Node.js, and Python, with solid experience in distributed systems and cloud environments.
hero.bulletTwoContent: Undergraduate student in Internet Systems (FATEC), with experience as a Programming Logic teaching assistant. Currently an exchange student through FATEC at the Polytechnic Institute of Bragança (Portugal), attending courses fully in English.
hero.bulletThreeContent: Developed AI-powered solutions using Python and cloud services to optimize processes and improve decision-making. Focused on delivering end-to-end systems that generate measurable business impact.
